body:
Hi Lars,

I think that you need to use the "inherit" modifier on the second
"alias" as follows"

inherit alias new_mat lars_mat

-Jack

Lars O. Grobe wrote:


--
#	John E. de Valpine
#	president
#
#	visarc incorporated
#	http://www.visarc.com
#
#	channeling technology for superior design and construction
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Alias pointing to another alias?
subject: [Radiance-general] Alias pointing to another alias?
